name: Shiny Falling Gems
description:
Shiny Falling Gems is a fun fast paced game where you move the gems towards their correct colour to get points! Use Power Ups to gain more points!

Compare your score with users all over the world, share your score on Facebook and Twitter. Compete with your friends, see who can catch the Shiny Gems the fastest!

Shiny Falling Gems Features:

*Full tutorial board to show you how to play the game

*Leader board to compare Shiny Gem scores with your friends or people around the world

*Use Power Ups to gain more points and help you collect more Shiny Gems!

*Share scores with Facebook or twitter!

*Gain coins by playing or Purchase more to use Power Ups immediately.

*Further Updates planned!

Further Updates to Shiny Falling Gems

*Achievements

*More Difficulties

*Option to Remove Ads

*Interactive Tutorial

*More Shiny Gems to choose from!
